page.title: 03A Poultry Farm:Gt.Bromley
page.content: The farm is 3 years old.{16,000} {chickens}are kept in 3 large sheds. Two sheds are for chickens laying eggs { (layers)}and another is for hens kept for meat{(broilers)}.The layers are kept 4 to a cage in multistorey rows. The broilers are left loose in a shed.These sheds are kept ventilated by fans all year round. The chickens are fed automatically and altogether consume{12 tons}of food per week. The feed is kept in silos until it is needed.The chickens are cleaned out weekly and the{muck}is sold to farmers for{fertilizer}.The eggs are graded and packed by hand in a 4th shed. The worst thing that can happen on this farm is a{power cut}.If this occurs the ventilation would cease and the chickens would{suffocate}in a few hours.
